gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: IAM Security & Core Profile
criteria: >80% unit test coverage for IAM & Profile services; All E2E tests for Registration, Login, and Logout passing; No critical or high vulnerabilities from SAST scan on IAM service; Successful profile picture upload and retrieval confirmed.
success_metrics: Zero regressions in authentication; Session invalidation confirmed to be working; Profile data persists correctly.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Profile & Account Recovery
criteria: All E2E tests for Password Reset, Deactivation, Work Experience CRUD, and Education CRUD are passing; All acceptance criteria for sprint stories are met and demo-ready; >80% overall test coverage maintained.
success_metrics: All features function as per acceptance criteria; No regressions in previously developed features.
